https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cZmhA1IxLRLQfTR9vpmKTPglbTy.jpg Kurosaki Ichigo, the temporary Shinigami (Death God) for Kuchiki Rukia, discovers his mother's killer as one of the Hollows he has been hunting. He does battle with it in a prideful battle of revenge. Bleach: Memories in the Rain
